channel.title: It on xkyle.com
channel.description: Recent content in It on xkyle.com

item.title: Build Systems out of Poured Concrete, not Bricks
item.description: Personally, I don’t have any kind of battle-hardened wisdom. Most of what I know comes from the wisdom of others. In particular I would like to acknowledge the real geniuses up front: My First Petabyte: Now What? (Jacob Farmer from Cambridge Computer) Google Platforms Rant (Steve Yegge of Google) http://perspectives.mvdirona.com/ (James Hamilton of Amazon) Ted Dzuiba Tons of blogs posts, LISA talks, that I can’t site specifically.
